content.query:
Select
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://avn6ftxocn5ljygpoc.dfs.core.windows.net/public/trip-data.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) as [t]

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://avn6ftxocn5ljygpoc.dfs.core.windows.net/public/fares-data.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) as [f]





Select
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://avn6ftxocn5ljygpoc.dfs.core.windows.net/public/trip-data.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) as [t]


SELECT
    medallion, hack_license, vendor_id, pickup_datetime, payment_type, fare_amount, mta_tax tip_amount, tolls_amount, total_amount
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://avn6ftxocn5ljygpoc.dfs.core.windows.net/public/fares-data.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) as [f]






SELECT
    medallion, hack_license, vendor_id, pickup_datetime, payment_type, fare_amount, mta_tax tip_amount, tolls_amount, total_amount
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://avn6ftxocn5ljygpoc.dfs.core.windows.net/public/fares-data.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) as [f]
WHERE CONVERT(int,total_amount) > 100







SELECT
    F.vendor_id, F.payment_type, SUM(CONVERT(int,total_amount)) as Amount , COUNT(CONVERT(int,t.passenger_count)) as TripCount, SUM(CONVERT(int,t.passenger_count)) as PassengerCount
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://avn6ftxocn5ljygpoc.dfs.core.windows.net/public/fares-data.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) as F
JOIN
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://avn6ftxocn5ljygpoc.dfs.core.windows.net/public/trip-data.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) as t
on f.medallion = t.medallion and
    f.hack_license = t.hack_license and
    f.vendor_id = t.vendor_id and
    f.pickup_datetime = t.pickup_datetime
WHERE F.payment_type = 'CRD'
Group by F.vendor_id, F.payment_type
Order by F.vendor_id, F.payment_type


create or alter view VendorPerformance
as
(
    SELECT
    F.vendor_id, F.payment_type, SUM(CONVERT(int,total_amount)) as Amount , COUNT(CONVERT(int,t.passenger_count)) as TripCount, SUM(CONVERT(int,t.passenger_count)) as PassengerCount
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://avn6ftxocn5ljygpoc.dfs.core.windows.net/public/fares-data.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) as F
JOIN
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://avn6ftxocn5ljygpoc.dfs.core.windows.net/public/trip-data.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) as t
on f.medallion = t.medallion and
    f.hack_license = t.hack_license and
    f.vendor_id = t.vendor_id and
    f.pickup_datetime = t.pickup_datetime
--WHERE F.payment_type = 'CRD'
Group by F.vendor_id, F.payment_type
)
